name: Stop That Baby
description:
STOP THAT BABY. The Dude vs. Demon Baby

Play this asymmetric 1 v 1 local multiplayer on one keyboard or with controllers. Created for Pirate Jam 2018 whilst sailing the Andaman Sea, surviving storms and sipping SamSong.

It's a bit of a rough prototype but any feedback is always appreciated.

GOALS

For The Dude: Heal The Baby. 

  •  Exorcise the demon baby by pushing it into the white Holy Space. 
  • You can only push the baby using your special! 
  • Close the baby's portals by walking over them.

For Demon Baby: Kill The Dude. 

  • Open portals to summon demons.
  • Stand on the portals to upgrade them and summon stronger demons. 
  • Avoid the Holy Space.

CONTROLS

For The Dude:

Action Keyboard Controller Movement W, A, S, D Analog stick / D-Pad Attack (hold) SPACE A Special Attack LEFT SHIFT B

For Demon Baby:

Action Keyboard Controller Movement UP, LEFT, DOWN, RIGHT Analog stick / D-Pad Create Portal RIGHT SHIFT A Remove Portal RIGHT CONTROL B
